headline: Trump Wants Copper Smelted in America—But It’s a 30-Year Wait
summary: With 47 million tons of copper resources, the U.S. has untapped potential, but new mines and smelters take decades to develop

headline: Copper Market Analysis Report 2025-2030, with Profiles of AngloAmerican, Antofagasta, Aurubis, BHP, Codelco, Freeport-McMoRan, Glencore, Jiangxi Copper, KGHM, Rio Tinto & Teck Resources
summary: Driving factors in the copper market include rising construction, renewable energy, and electric vehicle demand in emerging economies.
